# playAudio(configuration:_:)

**Instance Method**

Prepares and plays a real-time audio playback instance.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func playAudio(configuration: AudioGeneratorConfiguration = .init(), _ generatorRenderHandler: @escaping Audio.GeneratorRenderHandler) throws -> AudioGeneratorController
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: A set of configuration parameters necessary for initializing and rendering the `generatorRenderHandler`.
- **generatorRenderHandler**: The audio render handler to play. The system runs this handler to generate real-time audio.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioGeneratorController] instance that you use to manage audio playback. Use the controller to set the volume and start or stop playback.

## Discussion

Maintain playback by keeping a reference to the generator controller.



## Playing audio

- **playAudio(_:)**: Prepares and plays a new audio playback instance on this entity.
- **prepareAudio(configuration:_:)**: Prepares a real-time audio playback instances.
- **prepareAudio(_:)**: Prepares an audio resource for playback.
- **stopAllAudio()**: Stops playback for all audio on this entity.
- **spatialAudio**: The component that configures the spatial rendering of sounds from this entity.
- **ambientAudio**: The component that configures the ambient rendering of sounds from this entity.
- **channelAudio**: The component that configures the channel-based rendering of sounds from this entity.
